scripts.install-node: nvm install 20.8.0 && nvm install 18.18.0 && nvm install 16.20.2 && nvm install 14.21.3 && nvm install 12.22.12 && nvm install 10.24.1
scripts.benchmark-all: npm run benchmark-argapply && npm run benchmark-argspread && npm run benchmark-copyapply && npm run benchmark-copyspread && npm run benchmark-spreadspread
